Html:
Stumbled upon this: http://www.windows-arm.com/index.php/desktop-apps-for-windows-rt/729-wabbitemu-for-windows-rt

I'm looking at possibly buying a Surface RT tablet.
Is this for real or a hoax?

Stephan

Hi Stephan,

Sorry for the delayed reply. Yes this does appear to be legitimate, although I did not create this version and therefore will not be able to support it. I'd be curious to hear if it performs well on RT hardware, if anyone has used it.

BuckeyeDude
